mods.abstract: Photograph showing men and boys taking a break seated on a mass of rice grain sacks. A wagon loaded with rice bundles, and a steam powered threshing machine are shown in the background. A horse and buggy carrying women passengers are shown in the foreground, far left.
mods.note: Similar photograph found on Loose Photographs 15.; Compare photograph to the following publication. Stubbs, W.C. (1900) Rice. Louisiana Bulletin, No. 61, p. 392. Photograph is captioned, "Threshing Rice in Southwestern Louisiana."

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
